name: Drywall patch ≤6"
description: Same-day fix with fast-dry mud. Covers nail pops, dents, and small holes.
notes_for_ai: Use for small drywall damage up to about 6 inches. Apply minimum job total if this is the only line item.

name: Drywall patch 6–12"
description: 1–2 day process with return visit for sanding/finish. Flat rate covers multiple trips.
notes_for_ai: Use when patch size is between 6 and 12 inches or equivalent complexity. Remind client about return visit for sanding/paint if applicable.

name: Door slab replacement
description: Replace a standard interior door slab including hinge/hardware transfer.
notes_for_ai: Use for standard door replacements where framing and rough opening are in good condition. Price may increase for specialty or non-standard sizes.

name: Baseboard & trim replacement
description: Remove and replace approximately 10 linear feet of baseboard or trim.
notes_for_ai: Use as a baseline for small trim jobs. For larger runs, add additional quantity or custom line items based on total footage.

name: Faucet replacement
description: Replace an existing faucet with a new unit, reconnect supply lines, and test for leaks.
notes_for_ai: Use for straightforward sink faucet swaps where shutoffs work and no major corrosion is present. Customer typically supplies faucet.

name: Toilet flapper/fill valve replacement
description: Replace toilet flapper or fill valve to correct simple running or filling issues.
notes_for_ai: Use when the toilet is functional but running or not filling correctly. Includes one valve kit. Apply minimum job rule if alone.

name: Toilet replacement (standard swap)
description: Remove existing toilet and install a new customer-provided unit in the same location.
notes_for_ai: Use when flange and flooring are in good condition and no relocation is needed. Mention that client must supply the new toilet unless otherwise stated.

name: Sink drain/P-trap replacement
description: Remove old P-trap and related parts and install a new standard drain/P-trap assembly.
notes_for_ai: Use when under-sink access is reasonable and no major pipe reconfiguration is required.

name: Light fixture replacement
description: Like-for-like light fixture swap including removal of old fixture and installation of customer-supplied fixture.
notes_for_ai: Use for a single standard light fixture replacement. For additional fixtures in the same visit, add discounted add-on line items per guide.

name: Ceiling fan installation/replacement
description: Remove existing fan or light and install a ceiling fan at the same location using existing box and wiring.
notes_for_ai: Use when an appropriate fan-rated box exists. Add the fan-box SKU or surcharge if upgrading from a non-rated box.

name: Outlet/switch replacement (like-for-like)
description: Replace a single outlet or switch with a like-for-like device.
notes_for_ai: Use for one device. For multiple outlets/switches in the same visit, add extra quantity at a reduced marginal price per your business rules.

name: GFCI outlet replacement
description: Replace an existing standard outlet with a GFCI outlet or swap an older GFCI for a new unit.
notes_for_ai: Use when upgrading to GFCI near sinks, kitchens, baths, exterior, etc. Includes one device; additional units can be discounted.

name: Furniture assembly (standard piece)
description: Assemble one standard flat-pack piece such as a dresser, small shelf, or similar unit.
notes_for_ai: Use for one typical flat-pack furniture item. For multiple pieces, increase quantity and apply small discounts as appropriate.

name: Stair/step repair (single step)
description: Repair or replace one damaged stair tread or step, including basic carpentry and fastening.
notes_for_ai: Use for one step only. For multiple steps or structural issues, use Specialty or additional line items.

name: Handrail installation (up to 8 ft)
description: Install one straight handrail up to 8 feet with standard brackets.
notes_for_ai: Use for simple, straight handrails on stairs or walls. Curved, metal, or complex installations should be quoted as Specialty.

name: Accent wall painting
description: Prep and paint one accent wall up to approximately 150 sq ft with one color.
notes_for_ai: Use for standard height walls with light prep (nail holes, minor dings). For heavy prep or large walls, increase price or add line items.

name: Door painting (both sides)
description: Paint one standard interior door on both sides, including light prep and masking.
notes_for_ai: Use for a single interior door. Additional doors in the same visit can be discounted by adjusting standard_price downward per door.

name: Caulking & sealing (windows, tubs, siding)
description: Apply caulk or sealant around one standard window, tub, or small seam area.
notes_for_ai: Use for one primary area per line. For multiple windows or tub plus vanity, add quantity or additional line items.

name: Gutter cleaning (1-story, ≤150 ft)
description: Clean gutters on a one-story home up to 150 linear feet and clear downspout openings.
notes_for_ai: Use when access is safe and within one story. For longer runs, add extra footage as a separate line item.

name: Mailbox install/repair
description: Install or repair a standard mailbox and post.
notes_for_ai: Use for straightforward mailbox work. Concrete setting or specialty posts may require a higher priced line item.

name: TV mounting (≤65")
description: Mount one TV up to 65" on drywall with a standard bracket and basic wire management.
notes_for_ai: Use for single TV installs into typical stud/drywall scenarios. Heavier or masonry installs may require Specialty pricing.

name: Grab bar installation (bathroom safety)
description: Install one grab bar into appropriate backing or with proper anchors for bathroom safety.
notes_for_ai: Use for one bar. For multiple grab bars in the same visit, add additional quantity with slightly reduced price per bar.

name: Dryer vent cleaning
description: Clean one standard dryer vent run up to about 15 feet and clear lint buildup.
notes_for_ai: Use for typical residential dryer vents. Roof vents, long runs, or severe blockages may require additional charges.

name: Weatherstripping replacement (one opening)
description: Replace worn weatherstripping on one standard door or window.
notes_for_ai: Use for a single door or window. If doing multiple openings, increase quantity and adjust total accordingly.

name: Specialty project placeholder
description: Custom or complex project not covered by other line items.
notes_for_ai: Use when no existing SKU fits the scope. Always include a clear written scope and note that final price may adjust based on on-site findings.
